page.title: 09TRANSPORT (3)
page.content: a broad gauge,and in 1876 it was changed to a standard gauge,and was closed in 1964.The line that runs from the Junction to{Hemyock}was built in 1876 as a standard gauge,and it was closed in 1963.The first train ran on 29 May 1873,and there were also free rides. {British Rail}with{Devon County Council and{Mid Devon District Council}are building a new Inter City station, {TIVERTON PARKWAY.}The new station will be next to the M5 Motorway access point (Junction 27),and the{North {Devon Link Road}Junction at Sampford Peverell.It will be easier for people in Mid Devon and North Devon to use Inter City services. {Tiverton {Junction }will close down and { {Tiverton Parkway}will open in May 1986.
